text: Kogda zhe konchayutsya zapretnyye mesyatsy, togda ubivayte mnogobozhnikov, gde ni naydete ikh; staraytes' zakhvatit' ikh, osazhdayte ikh, delayte vokrug ikh zasady na vsyakom meste, gde mozhno podsterech' ikh. No yesli oni s raskayaniyem obratyatsya, budut sovershat' molitvu, budut davat' ochistitel'nuyu milostynyu; to dayte im svobodnyy put': Bog - proshchayushchiy, miloserd
